metadata.title: Chicastic Pleated and Braided Rhinestone studded Wedding Evening Bridal Bridesmaid Clutch Purse
features: Rhinestone Decoration on top & closure. Comes with a chain strap - shoulder 22" long and wrist 6" long.
Outside Measurement - L - 9 in x H - 5 in x W - 1 in, Inside Measurement - L - 7 in x H - 4 in x W - 1 in
Braided Design is only on the front of the purse. Backside is plain.
This delicate clutch purse is perfect for weddings and formal events. Fits a phone, lipstick, keys, cards well!
description: Elegant pleated and braided satin along with rhinestone decoration make a very beautiful wedding clutch purse
metadata.details: {"Is Discontinued By Manufacturer": "No", "Product Dimensions": "8 x 1 x 6 inches; 8.8 Ounces", "Item model number": "CHIC591-09", "Department": "womens", "Date First Available": "November 24, 2014"}
